TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Deletion of Identifiables referenced by other Identifiables
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Verify correct exchange behavior when deleting Identifiables which are referenced by other Identifiables
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: Nation A creates an Identifiable which is referenced by another Identifiable. Nation B receives the information. Nation A deletes the Identifiable which is referenced by another Identifiable. Nation B receives this information and Identifiable are deleted from Overlay and the references too.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-locates. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: Nation A has created a topic, which includes the Overlay. Nation B has subscribed to this topic. The Overlay was already exchanged after it was created by Nation A so that it is available on both systems.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the updates are display correctly on both Nationsâ€™ C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A creates an Identifiable which is referenced by another Identifiable.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives the information and displays the Identifiable correct.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Nation A deletes the Identifiable which is referenced by another Identifiable.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Nation B receives this information and Identifiable are deleted from Overlay and the references too.
